Sher: कोई हाथ भी न मिलाएगा जो गले मिलोगे तपाक से ये नए मिज़ाज का शहर है ज़रा फ़ासले से मिला करो
translation_extracted_from_json: No one will even shake hands, you will hug with enthusiasm, this is a city of new manners, meet with some distance.

Sher: हम हुए तुम हुए कि 'मीर' हुए उस की ज़ुल्फ़ों के सब असीर हुए
translation_extracted_from_json: We were yours, and you were ours, for we were captivated by the tresses of that beloved 'Mir'.

Sher: ले दे के अपने पास फ़क़त इक नज़र तो है क्यूँ देखें ज़िंदगी को किसी की नज़र से हम
translation_extracted_from_json: Take a glance of your own, why look at life through someone else's gaze, we have only one glance of our own.

translation_extracted_from_json: How can there be a hole in the sky, friend, throw a stone and see!

Sher: हम ने माना कि तग़ाफ़ुल न करोगे लेकिन ख़ाक हो जाएँगे हम तुम को ख़बर होते तक
translation_extracted_from_json: We had assumed that you won't betray, but we'll be reduced to dust by the time you get the news.

translation_extracted_from_json: This is the humble tale of a word of love; when it contracts, it fills the lover's heart, and when it expands, it fills the entire era.

Sher: उल्टी हो गईं सब तदबीरें कुछ न दवा ने काम किया देखा इस बीमारी-ए-दिल ने आख़िर काम तमाम किया
translation_extracted_from_json: All plans failed, no medicine worked, saw that this heart disease finally succeeded in the end.

translation_extracted_from_json: The desire for martyrdom is now in our hearts, let's see how much strength is in the arms of the executioner.

Sher: दिल की चोटों ने कभी चैन से रहने न दिया जब चली सर्द हवा मैं ने तुझे याद किया
translation_extracted_from_json: The wounds of the heart never let me live in peace, when the cold wind blew, I remembered you.

Sher: हज़ारों साल नर्गिस अपनी बे-नूरी पे रोती है बड़ी मुश्किल से होता है चमन में दीदा-वर पैदा
translation_extracted_from_json: For thousands of years, the narcissus flower has been crying over its own helplessness, it is very difficult for a beauty like yours to be born in the garden.

translation_extracted_from_json: What can we say about the delicacy of her lips, they are like the petals of a rose.

Sher: ग़रज़ कि काट दिए ज़िंदगी के दिन ऐ दोस्त वो तेरी याद में हों या तुझे भुलाने में
translation_extracted_from_json: Some days of life were spent, O friend, whether they were spent in your remembrance or in trying to forget you.

Sher: बे-ख़ुदी बे-सबब नहीं 'ग़ालिब' कुछ तो है जिस की पर्दा-दारी है
translation_extracted_from_json: There must be something, 'Ghalib', that has a curtain of secrecy, and is not without a reason or purpose, this careless and aimless existence.

translation_extracted_from_json: My fellow traveler, my fellow boatman, don't push me into the depths, I am exhausted from the pain of love, don't pray for my life.

Sher: दिल अभी पूरी तरह टूटा नहीं दोस्तों की मेहरबानी चाहिए
translation_extracted_from_json: The heart is not completely broken, friends' kindness is needed.

translation_extracted_from_json: The veil on your forehead is very beautiful, but it would have been better if you had made a flag out of it.

Sher: मकतब-ए-इश्क़ का दस्तूर निराला देखा उस को छुट्टी न मिले जिस को सबक़ याद रहे
translation_extracted_from_json: The protocol of the school of love is unique, whoever saw it, didn't get a leave, whoever got the lesson, remembered it forever.

Sher: ज़िंदगी क्या किसी मुफ़लिस की क़बा है जिस में हर घड़ी दर्द के पैवंद लगे जाते हैं
translation_extracted_from_json: Life is the tomb of some wretched person, where every moment is marked by the stitches of pain.

Sher: घर से मस्जिद है बहुत दूर चलो यूँ कर लें किसी रोते हुए बच्चे को हँसाया जाए
translation_extracted_from_json: The mosque is far from home, let's do it this way, and make a crying child laugh.

Sher: आईना क्यूँ न दूँ कि तमाशा कहें जिसे ऐसा कहाँ से लाऊँ कि तुझ सा कहें जिसे
translation_extracted_from_json: Why shouldn't I mirror thee, for whom they call a spectacle? Where can I find someone like thee, for whom they say the same?

translation_extracted_from_json: The desire for martyrdom is now in our hearts, let's see how much strength is in the arm of the executioner.

translation_extracted_from_json: The sparks of the heart have ignited, setting the home ablaze with the scars of the chest, and the lamp of the home has lit the fire.

translation_extracted_from_json: We assumed you won't bother, but we will be reduced to dust before you even get a hint.
